name: Nokia 1011
description: First digital and mass-produced handheld phone

name: Bellsouth/IBM Simon Personal Communicator
description: First “smartphone” with touchscreen and apps (incl. fax and e-mail)

name: Siemens S10
description: First mobile phone with a color screen

name: Nokia 3210
description: One of the best sold mobile phones in history. Had an internal antenna, changeable cover and 3 games (incl. Snake).

name: Sharp J-SH04
description: First mobile phone with built-in camera (Japan only)

name: Blackberry Quark 6210
description: First fully integrated Blackberry phone introducing Blackberry Messenger.

name: Apple iPhone
description: First mobile phone by Apple with a full-size touch screen, iPod functionalities and apps. The AppStore for third-party apps followed in 2008.
